Connect with leading CRM platforms and marketing tools to streamline your event marketing workflow.

### HubSpot

Sync contacts, deals, and activities automatically

- Two-way sync
- Custom field mapping
- Real-time updates

![Pipedrive](https://attendflowio.lovable.app/assets/pipedrive-BezcY76A.svg)

### Pipedrive

Connect your sales pipeline with event data

- Deal tracking
- Pipeline automation
- Activity logging

![Salesforce](https://attendflowio.lovable.app/assets/salesforce-vtCDy4RE.svg)

### Salesforce

Enterprise-grade CRM integration

- Lead management
- Custom objects
- Workflow automation

![Gmail](<Base64-Image-Removed>)

### Gmail

Calendar and email integration for scheduling

- Calendar sync
- Email automation
- Meeting scheduling

## Built for Seamless Integration

Our integration platform provides enterprise-grade capabilities with simple setup.

Bi-directional sync

Real-time data updates

Custom field mapping

Automated workflows

Secure OAuth authentication

Enterprise-grade security

## Why Integrate with Attendflow?

Transform your event marketing with powerful integrations that save time and boost results.



### Save Time Weekly

Automated sync eliminates manual work



### Never Miss a Lead

Real-time synchronization keeps your data up-to-date



### One Source of Truth

Centralized data management across all your tools



### Enterprise Security

Secure OAuth authentication and encrypted data transfer
